content.d: Clap clap clap. Rina-chan Board says, “Captivated”?
Really. Seeing you practice makes me look forward to the next Drama Club performance even more.
Is there anything in particular that you liked...?

I can’t narrow it down. The struggle of an unwanted fight, the sadness of not being able to trust someone because of past betrayals, the joy of finally regaining strength and confidence, the fun of laughing with someone, the unyielding passion... Every emotion came through clearly.
Really? I have more to say...... May I continue?
No, no! If you praise me too much, it’ll feel like I have no more room for improvement~~~!!
